title: Pie Bombs

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Throw a pie bomb at someone. It explodes, dealing an unstoppable attack

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -After throwing a pie bomb, you need to wait a night for another to be made in a factory. More specifically, a BOMB factory.

desc:
Post 3574
_Oh I didn’t make these. They were made in a factory. a BOMB factory. They’re bombs_
